name: Novilar Sex Colours
description: Colours sex badges to make it easier to tell at a glance the sex of any pet.
additional_info: This style is so short and simple, you don't have to use it as a standalone. You can view CSS, copy it, and append it to the compact mode or nightmode if you use those. It's available as a standalone for future-proofing, and to allow users to only install this if they dislike both nightmode and compact mode.
